oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Escartín Clavería, Beatriz
Belloc, Cedric
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effects and avoidance of lightning strikes on aircraft
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: descargas electroestáticas
tormentas eléctricas
aviones
materiales compuestos
radar atmosférico
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The following report is based upon studying the effects of the lightning strikes on aircraft, attending to its direct and indirect effects. To achieve this above, a number of key stages have been completed, including research and testing procedures, which then are taken into account for doing the project. The research is about the effects, tests and standards and materials on aircraft, such as composite materials, which are really used nowadays for manufacturing aircrafts.
